name: Santa Clara County Surplus Property Donation Program
description: Donated surplus county property including office furniture, equipment, and supplies available to eligible nonprofit organizations upon request and approval
fullDescription: Santa Clara County donates surplus property to eligible nonprofit organizations, providing free office furniture, equipment, and supplies.
whatTheyOffer:
- Surplus office furniture
- Office equipment
- General supplies
- Technology items (when available)
- Items provided free of charge
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit in Santa Clara County
2. Submit a donation request through the county website
3. Provide proof of nonprofit status
4. Wait for approval and notification of available items
5. Arrange pickup within specified timeframe
